caption:
Comment “CLAUDE” and we’ll send you the link.

This is how Claude stops being a chatbot and starts acting like a real assistant.

Someone just dropped 60+ Claude skills on GitHub—and they turn Claude into a full-blown agent.

You can generate PowerPoint decks, build Excel models, and analyze competitor ads end to end.

Once it’s set up, you can say things like: create a pitch deck, build a spreadsheet, or connect an external API.

Claude runs the entire workflow for you.

You can even create custom skills for weekly work like follow-ups, sales reports, or research briefs.

Just comment “Claude” and we’ll send you the link. 

#ai #artificialintelligence #workflow
Creator: tenex_labs
